snippet: The trustees said the hospital is in such bad shape financially that it threatens the viability of the university’s Brooklyn medical school.
abstract: State University of New York trustees vote unanimously to close Long Island College Hospital, saying it is in such bad shape financially that it threatens the viability of SUNY Downstate Medical Center, university’s Brooklyn medical school and related facilities.
lead_paragraph: The trustees said the hospital is in such bad shape financially that it threatens the viability of the university’s Brooklyn medical school.
